title: To Our Listeners
description:
Let’s honor the memory of Breonna Taylor on her birthday. She would be 27 years old on June 4th. Please DONATE to Breonna Taylor’s Go Fund Me, JUSTICE FOR BREONNA TAYLOR.

https://www.gofundme.com/f/9v4q2-justice-for-breonna-taylor

Casey will be matching donations up to $5,000.00 so whatever you donate will be doubled!

If you send photos of your receipt of payment to our email, the first 500 people to do so will be invited to a Live ZOOM Bitch Sesh. Email: Bootsonthegroundbs@gmail.com

Let’s keep the pressure on Mayor Greg Fischer to ensure Breonna gets the justice she deserves. CALL (844) 298 2731 to demand the officers be fired, arrested and charged.

Spread the word on social media using these hashtags: #sayhername #justiceforbre #BirthdayforBreonna
author: bwordsesh@gmail.com (Earwolf & Casey Wilson, Danielle Schneider)
